mapper.sql: SELECT MPC.CLT_NO, MPC.MEMBER_NO, MPC.CLT_CONTENT, MPC.CLT_CREATE_DATE, MPC.CLT_MODIFY_DATE, MPC.CLT_STATUS, MPC.CLT_IMG_01_ONAME, MPC.CLT_IMG_01_RNAME, MPC.CLT_WRITER_ID FROM MYPAGE_P_COLLECTION MPC JOIN MEMBER M ON (MPC.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MYPAGE_P_COLLECTION WHERE CLT_STATUS = 'Y' AND CLT_WRITER_ID = #{ id } ORDER BY CLT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYPAGE_P_COLLECTION MPC( MPC.CLT_NO, MPC.MEMBER_NO, MPC.CLT_CONTENT, MPC.CLT_CREATE_DATE, MPC.CLT_MODIFY_DATE, MPC.CLT_STATUS, MPC.CLT_IMG_01_ONAME, MPC.CLT_IMG_01_RNAME, MPC.CLT_WRITER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_MPC_CLT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ cltMemberNo }, #{ cltContent }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ originalFileName01 }, #{ renamedFileName01 }, #{ cltWriterId } )
mapper.update: UPDATE MYPAGE_P_COLLECTION MPC SET MPC.CLT_CONTENT = #{ cltContent }, MPC.CLT_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MPC.CLT_NO = #{ cltNo }
